entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
